import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { instituteAPI } from '../../services/api'; import './HomePage.css'; const HomePage = () => { const [featuredInstitutes, setFeaturedInstitutes] = useState([]); const [stats, setStats] = useState({ institutes: 0, reviews: 0, students: 0 }); useEffect(() => { fetchHomeData(); }, []); const fetchHomeData = async () => { try { const response = await instituteAPI.getAll(); setFeaturedInstitutes(response.data.slice(0, 6)); // Mock stats setStats({ institutes: response.data.length, reviews: 245, students: 1234 }); } catch (error) { console.error('Error fetching home data:', error); } }; return (
